subject: Re: FW: Finalist Certificate
preview: Hi Rosanna,  Sure, confirming we have now removed the Valentines Day message.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosanna,

Sure, confirming we have now removed the Valentines Day message.

Hi Heath,

Can we remove the valentine message please

Kind Regards

Rosanna

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Hi Rosanna, 

I believe you were looking at a cached version. Can you please try again?
@heath when i checked the website, it seems that everything is already there.

Hi Rico

I have noticed you have changed the menu for Valentines, however it still says 2020 can you change it to 2021

And can we make the front of the website with the Valentines image

Kind Regards

Rosanna

We are currently working on the Valentines' menu changes. We'll send you an email once it is completed. Cheers!

Also just checking on the Valentines request

From: Mary Capurso <mary@rca.asn.au <mailto:mary@rca.asn.au>>
Sent: Monday, 23 November 2020 12:28 PM
To: Machiavelli <info@machiavelli.com.au <mailto:info@machiavelli.com.au>>
Subject: Finalist Certificate

Dear Finalist,

Congratulations for achieving State Finalist status for the 2020 Restaurant & Catering Awards for Excellence.
Please see attached an electronic version of your finalist certificate that you can print to display.
The Awards will be held on 07th December at The Venue Alexandria.
We look forward to celebrating excellence with you at the awards.


Regards


<https://bit.ly/2IKfnMU>
This email, including any attachments, may be private and confidential, and is intended solely for the use of the individual and/or entity to which it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not disclose or use any of the information contained in it. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy the email and any of its attachments.
